title: SaNmukhanai dinam
sahitya:
SaNmukhanai dinam eNNiDu manamE viNNavarum tudi paNNIDum pazhani


anupallavi

  eNNAda eNNam pala eNNiyeNNi vINil puNNAgum paDikku nI puzhungit-tuDikkAmal 


caraNam    maNNAshaiyum maruvum peNNAshaiyum tarum mayakkattinAl perum tuyaram ini urAdE
kaNDAlum kali tIra daNDAyudam tAngi paNDArat-tirukkOlam koNDOngum aNNal
